what: Ensure downballot Python environment is ready ‚Äî downballot_ensure_python

text: Ensure downballot Python environment ready

title: Ensure downballot Python environment is ready ‚Äî downballot_ensure_python

what: Install Python dependencies for downballotR ‚Äî downballot_install_python
title: Install Python dependencies for downballotR ‚Äî downballot_install_python
text: Creates/uses named virtual environment installs Python requirements (pandas, requests, lxml, playwright), installs Playwright Chromium.

title: Install Python dependencies for downballotR ‚Äî downballot_install_python
code: downballot_install_python(   envname = "downballotR",   python = NULL,   reinstall = FALSE,   install_chromium = TRUE,   quiet = FALSE )

title: Install Python dependencies for downballotR ‚Äî downballot_install_python
text: envname Name virtualenv create/use. python Path python executable use creating env (optional). reinstall TRUE, reinstall packages even already installed. install_chromium TRUE, install Playwright Chromium browser. quiet TRUE, suppress progress messages.

title: Install Python dependencies for downballotR ‚Äî downballot_install_python
text: environment already exists required packages present, function prints message returns without work (unless Chromium missing install_chromium = TRUE). cases, attempts initialize reticulate selected interpreter session.

what: Check Python environment status for downballotR ‚Äî downballot_python_status
title: Check Python environment status for downballotR ‚Äî downballot_python_status
text: Reports whether Python virtual environment exists, whether reticulate initialized (Python active), required packages missing, whether Playwright Chromium available.

title: Check Python environment status for downballotR ‚Äî downballot_python_status
code: downballot_python_status(   envname = "downballotR",   required_pkgs = db_required_python_packages(),   quiet = FALSE )

title: Check Python environment status for downballotR ‚Äî downballot_python_status
text: envname Name virtualenv check. required_pkgs Character vector required Python packages. Defaults db_required_python_packages(). quiet TRUE, print. (can still print() returned object explicitly.)

title: Check Python environment status for downballotR ‚Äî downballot_python_status
text: object class downballot_python_status. Invisibly quiet = FALSE.

title: Check Python environment status for downballotR ‚Äî downballot_python_status
text: function modify environment.

what: Use the downballotR Python virtualenv in this R session ‚Äî downballot_use_python
title: Use the downballotR Python virtualenv in this R session ‚Äî downballot_use_python
text: Pins reticulate package's virtualenv current R session. reticulate already initialized different interpreter, error clear message (reticulate switch interpreters mid-session).

title: Use the downballotR Python virtualenv in this R session ‚Äî downballot_use_python
Use the downballotR Python virtualenv in this R session ‚Äî downballot_use_python
